item.title: Expert Video Ad Creator for Meta, YouTube, and Twitter - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Video Ad Creator with expertise in growth hacking, storytelling, and creating high-performing video ads. The ideal candidate will craft short, engaging ads (20-30 seconds) for our OTT platform, Prachyam. These ads will be featured on Meta, YouTube, and Twitter, targeting a wide audience with a focus on driving engagement and subscriptions.

Responsibilities:

Develop and produce 20-30 second video ads that are compelling and visually appealing.
Utilize growth hacking techniques to maximize ad performance and engagement.
Incorporate storytelling elements to capture the audience's attention quickly.
Tailor ad content to different platforms (Meta, YouTube, Twitter) to ensure optimal performance.
Collaborate with our marketing team to align ads with our brand and promotional strategies.
Analyze ad performance metrics and adjust strategies to improve results continuously.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating high-performing video ads for social media platforms.
Strong understanding of growth hacking principles and techniques.
Exceptional storytelling skills with the ability to convey a message succinctly.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Familiarity with Meta, YouTube, and Twitter ad formats and best practices.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team.
Portfolio showcasing previous video ad projects with successful outcomes.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating ads for OTT platforms or similar industries.
Knowledge of Indian culture and heritage, aligning with Prachyam's mission.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 06:00 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Display Ad, Video Advertising, Video Ad Campaign, YouTube Ads, Video Ad, Short Video Ad
Skills: Display Ad, Video Advertising, Video Ad Campaign, YouTube Ads, Video Ad, Short Video Ad
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Tapping Your Fingers on Table Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I'm trying to find someone who can tap their fingers on a table for an hour 60. You can do this while you work, relax, study, watch a movie or anything in the background.

This doesn't have to be something you have to record in one period of time. You can record several 10 minute videos and combine them into an hour if it's easier for you. As long as each video is different.

I'm trying to find someone who can tap in smooth patterns really easily and loudly, similar to the video example here:

https://youtube.com/clip/Ugkxj0GAzcVG1NB6AOqs20B_hx2dfFwoJpYO?si=Bp6_khRM5C8hs1Eh

It's hard finding someone who can tap like this, so sending even a 10 second proposal of similar tapping would really help me find the right person for this, but it's not required. I added preferred camera angles for this video because I prefer the tapping being really close to the camera.

Hoping this will be easy and fun for someone to do and I'm hoping maybe to find someone I can keep going back to for this.

Thank you to anyone interested! Ask anything anytime!

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 23, 2024 05:57 UTC
Category: Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Marketing Genius for dropshipping store - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced marketing genius to join our team and help us optimize and drive traffic to our new dropshipping store. As a marketing genius, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, attract new customers, and ultimately drive sales. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of success in dropshipping marketing, a deep understanding of the latest marketing trends and techniques, and excellent analytical skills.
  Responsibilities:
  - Develop and execute innovative marketing campaigns
  - Conduct market research and analyze customer insights
  - Optimize conversion rates and improve customer acquisition
  - Manage social media accounts and create engaging content with good hooks and angles
  - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve business goals

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience in dropshipping marketing/ 100k+ per store
  - Strong knowledge of digital marketing channels and strategies
  - Proficient in market research and analytics tools
  - Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  - Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities

  If you are a results-driven marketing genius with a passion for dropshipping, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to make a significant impact and help grow our business


Posted On: June 23, 2024 05:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Dropshipping, Facebook Advertising, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Ecommerce, Video Production, Real Estate Video, Ecommerce Marketing, Amazon Dropshipping, Shopify Dropshipping, Video Ad, Facebook Marketing, UGC, Photo Editing, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Videography, Real Estate Marketing
Skills: Graphic Design, Dropshipping, Facebook Advertising, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Ecommerce, Video Production, Real Estate Video, Ecommerce Marketing, Amazon Dropshipping, Shopify Dropshipping, Video Ad, Facebook Marketing, UGC, Photo Editing, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Videography, Real Estate Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editor for Small Background Image Fix - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a professional video editor who can assist us with a small background image fix. The task involves making a minor adjustment to the background image in our video to ensure it aligns perfectly with the content. This requires careful attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and be proficient in using editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively are also essential for this project.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Attention to detail
- Aesthetic sense
- Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Strong communication skills

This is a small project that can be completed quickly for the right candidate. We are looking for someone who can start immediately and deliver quality results within a short timeframe.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 05:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply
